description: Our teams are heading to Miami this weekend to host the final Stay Well Community Vaccine event! A wonderful way to culminate Black History Month! A BIG high...
cleaned_text: Media Relations & Communications Leader for Healthcare & Positive Societal Changes Campaigns | Insightful, Results-Driven Strategist | Moderator | Public Speaking Our teams are heading to Miami this weekend to host the final Stay Well Community Vaccine event! A wonderful way to culminate Black History Month! A BIG high five to the Miami Herald wrote this article about our event. Perfect culminate a busy week and an amazing 13-city vaccine tour in Black communities across the U.S! So far, more than 1,200 people have been vaccinated! So, lets honor Black History Month, trust Black science behind the vaccines and get more shots into
